articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts by the delegations of the People's Party of Cambodia (PPC) and the Communist Party of Germany (CPG) and the secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea (CILRECO) on the occasion of the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
 The gifts were respectively conveyed to an official concerned by President Yos Son of the external relations committee of the PPC, vice-chairman Hans Wauer of the CPG central committee and secretary general Guy Dupre of the CILRECO on a visit to the DPRK.

SPA delegation leaves for China
articles.content:
SPA delegation leaves for China 
    Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly led by minister of public health Kim Su Hak who is deputy to the spa left here yesterday to attend the third conference of the Association of Asian Parliament for Peace to be held in China.
 The delegation was seen off at the airport by an official concerned and the Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings to Syrian leaders
articles.content:
Greetings to Syrian leaders 
     Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, yesterday sent a message of greetings to Bashar Al Assad, President of Syria, on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of its independence.
 In the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will continue to grow stronger, the message sincerely wished the president, the government and the people of Syria success in their work to achieve the development of the country and the regional stability.    
 Meanwhile, Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet, sent a message of greetings to his Syrian counterpart Muhammad Mustafa Miro.

articles.title: Floral basket to Kim Il Sung's Statue from Denmark
articles.content:
Floral basket to Kim Il Sung's Statue from Denmark 
    Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Danish Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) sent a floral basket to the Statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on the occasion of his 90th birth anniversary.
 The floral basket was laid before the statue by Jorgen Petersen, chairman of the Danish Communist Party (M-L) who is heading the visiting delegation of the party on April 15.

articles.title: Greetings to Danish queen
articles.content:
Greetings to Danish queen 
    Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on April 14 sent a message of greetings to Margrethe 11, queen of Denmark, on the occasion of its national day.
 Extending warm congratulations to the queen and the people of Denmark on the national day, the birthday of the queen, the message wished her good health and happiness and the Danish people wellbeing and prosperity.
